site.Title: Movie Posters
site.Description: Find Great Movie Posters with Your Windows Phone!
site.Subtitle: Excellent Windows Phone 7 app for finding High Quality Wallpapers!
site.MetaDescription: Windows Phone 7 app for finding great wallpapers with Movie Posters. Just enter the name of the movie and you will get a high resolution poster provided by the extensive TMDb. Simple and fast to use.
site.MetaKeywords: wp7, windows phone, windows phone 7, wp7 apps, windows phone 7 apps, movies, movie posters, posters, poster, movie poster

Features.Feature: Search through millions of high quality movie posters. Posters are provided by TMDb.
Use Movie Posters to find great wallpapers for your phone. Save your favourite to your phone's gallery and make it the wallpaper.
Share your favourite posters with your friends.

site.FeaturesSubtitle: Find HQ Windows Phone Wallpapers easily
site.AboutSubtitle: Movie Posters - HQ Windows Phone Wallpapers
site.Feedback: Please, contact us if you have any problems or if you have ideas about how to make this Windows Phone app better.
